Comment: My opponent was rated third in the tournament and went on to win it.
I played three Sicilian Defences in the tournament - all against players with a higher rating - I lost them all!
I repeat this move order, designed to prevent 2....Nc6 3. Bb5
But he plays it any way.
This seemed the most logical block.
This was all a slight surprise.
So I hit the e pawn.
He takes back, with pressure down the semi-open a file against my rook.
